name: RIYA
textInChatBox: Many many happy returns blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are, and always will be, Special
outroText: In a world full of stars, you shine the brightest, With a heart so pure, you're truly the kindest. Your thoughts are deep, your soul is rare, You show love in ways that few would dare. You lift others up, make them feel whole, Gracefully juggling life's every role. To know you is to love you, with all my heart and soul.
replayText: Happy b'day once again..!! If you want to watch it again 'Click Me'.
